alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 1:55PM MDT until September 04 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... North central Fall River County in southwestern South Dakota... Southwestern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 154 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Jewel Cave National Monument to 3 miles northeast of Cascade Falls, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hot Springs, Argyle, Maverick Junction, Cold Brook Reservoir, Cottonwood Springs Dam, and Wind Cave National Park around 200 PM MDT. Pringle around 205 PM MDT. Custer, Buffalo Gap, and Custer State Park around 210 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Buffalo Corrals, Mount Coolidge, Stockade Lake, Blue Bell, Legion Lake, Fairburn, Black Hills Playhouse, Sylvan Lake, State Game Lodge, Center Lake, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Black Elk Peak, Keystone, Horse Thief Lake and Keystone Wye. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
